arts.ttl: Jo√£o Pedro scores twice vs. boyhood team, Chelsea beats Fluminense 2-0 to reach Club World Cup final
arts.sum: Jo√£o Pedro scored twice against his boyhood team in his first start for Chelsea, leading the Blues over Fluminense 2-0 Tuesday to assure an all-European Club World Cup final. A 23-year-old who had been at Fluminense from about age 10 until leaving for Watford in 2020, Jo√£o Pedro scored in the 18th and 56th minutes and refused to celebrate either goal in a sign of respect for his former club.

arts.ttl: Fluminense 0-2 Chelsea: Player Ratings As First Club World Cup Finalist Confirmed
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca handed Joao Pedro, Chelsea's latest signing, his first start and the decision paid dividends less than 20 minutes into the game. Player ratings from the game below.

arts.ttl: Cole Palmer spotted going absolutely berserk after what Nicolas Jackson did vs Fluminense, Chelsea star was so angry
arts.sum: Palmer really didn't like what happened!

arts.ttl: Joao Pedro stuns former club Fluminense, sends Chelsea to Club World Cup final
arts.sum: Look at these stats that explain a lot: Joao Pedro, the Brazilian who scored the 1-0 and 2-0, came through Fluminense's youth academy (which is why he apologized after both goals) and cost Chelsea around 64 million euros (paid to Brighton); the same amount Dortmund paid for Gittens (the Englishman); and nearly the same (61.5) as Estev√£o... That said, in this semifinal against Flu, they were the clear favorites-and they proved it with goals and control of the game.

arts.ttl: Pedro powers Chelsea into Club World Cup final as Fluminense fall short
arts.sum: Joao Pedro powers Chelsea into the Club World Cup final with a brace in a 2-0 win over his former side Fluminense, setting up a blockbuster showdown with either Paris Saint-Germain or Real Madrid.

arts.ttl: Revealed: Referee explains why Fluminense had penalty overturned by VAR during Club World Cup semi-final against Chelsea
arts.sum: The referee of Chelsea's Club World Cup semi-final clash against Fluminese revealed why he opted not to give a penalty to the Brazilian side during Tuesday's match.

arts.ttl: Joao Pedro announces himself to Chelsea to show boyhood club Fluminense how far he‚Äôs come
arts.sum: Fluminense 0-2 Chelsea: Joao Pedro came back to haunt his boyhood club to justify Chelsea‚Äôs investment in him

arts.ttl: Jo√£o Pedro sends Chelsea to Club World Cup final as stunners sink Fluminense
arts.sum: Fluminense 0-2 Chelsea (Jo√£o Pedro 18, 56) New signing scores twice against boyhood club The talk was mostly about Enzo Maresca wanting to add more guile to his attack when Chelsea signed Jo√£o Pedro last week. Less was made of the former Brighton forward‚Äôs ability to crash through an opposition defence. Then again Fluminense made Jo√£o Pedro and were probably not surprised to find their former star in scintillating goalscoring form in this one-sided Club World Cup semi-final. Two thunderous finishes from the versatile attacker were enough to ensure that Chelsea will return to the MetLife Stadium to face Paris Saint-Germain or Real Madrid in Sunday‚Äôs final. They can make ¬£97m in prize money from this tournament, which is probably just as well given their spending. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Fluminense 0-2 Chelsea: New boy Joao Pedro bags brilliant brace against former side to fire Blues into Club World Cup final
arts.sum: KIERAN GILL: Joao Pedro twice stood apologetically with his arms in the air, not wanting Fluminense's fans to think he was being disrespectful. It was a shame in a way.

arts.ttl: Chelsea fans have two complaints about Joao Pedro after 2-0 Club World Cup win over Fluminense, despite stunning goals
